title: CAR MODEL VARIANT detail page Â» LAP TIMES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see all LAP TIMES a CAR MODEL VARIANT has achieved\
So I can get an idea about its performance
description:
* The CAR MODEL VARIANT detail page contains a section with a list of all connected LAP TIMES.
* Each LAP TIME in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each LAP TIME in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each LAP TIME in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no LAP TIME connected to the CAR MODEL VARIANT then the section is not displayed at all.
